name: administrative-code-18-144-park-maintenance-report-payroll-data-fiscal-year-2016
title: Administrative Code 18-144 Park Maintenance Report Payroll Data, Fiscal Year 2016
description: This data contains the payroll information for a subset of the NYC Parks responsible for park cleaning & maintenance, and was used to produce the FY2016 report on Park Maintenance as required by Adminstrative Code 18-144. This report can be accessed at https://www.nycgovparks.org/news/archive. Data accuracy is limited by the scale and accuracy of the original sources, which are owned by the Office of Payroll Administration/Financial Information Services Agency (OPA/FISA).
